hadiths.text: Narrated Al-Miqdad ibn al-Aswad: I never saw the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) praying in front of a stick, a pillar, or a tree, without having it opposite his right or left eyebrow, and not facing it directly

chapter.ara-name: باب إِذَا صَلَّى إِلَى سَارِيَةٍ أَوْ نَحْوِهَا أَيْنَ يَجْعَلُهَا مِنْهُ
chapter.eng-name: If He Prays Towards A Pillar Or Other Object, Where Should It Be In Relation To Him
